title: 2v2 BOT LANE
body: Hi, if anyone can beat my friend and I in a 2v2 bot lane, must play a support and adc, we will give you riot points! We are currently undefeated, with 22 wins to 0 losses. Add me in-game on Norton 360.

replies.body: hahahah a sup and adc so I cant do a {{champion:17}} {{champion:69}} bot well then you meta scrub
2v2 me then with them picks, still own u son

lol you know that the way it works is that cas twin fangs go on a 0.5 sec cd wen a target is poisoned and with the teemo e passive you will have it on you all the time and thus she can do 1k damage with just 50 ap in less then 2 sec  try it you will see how op it is

> [{quoted}](name=snakeowen,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=4atNFVNW,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2015-09-30T09:12:27.505+0000)
>
> lol you know that the way it works is that cas twin fangs go on a 0.5 sec cd wen a target is poisoned and with the teemo e passive you will have it on you all the time and thus she can do 1k damage with just 50 ap in less then 2 sec  try it you will see how op it is

{{champion:29}} and {{champion:69}}  is how you do it because cass is a poke sup and twitch's poison works on her e
Can confirm, haven't lost a 2v2 yet!
